pageContext.other: 2 cross section drawings of palstave on reverse., Loop is intact, appears to extend almost all the way back to butt., Wings somewhat decayed, butt slightly damaged.
pageContext.associations: Found with No 385, Found with No 1952, The only survivors of a large hoard.
